xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.1 Kusalapada » 2.4.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
53.
1373Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
54.
1374Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1375Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1376Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1377(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2.4.2 Akusalapada >>
